dcterms:creator: C. Brunner
et al.
dcterms:description: A 4-classes motor-imagery dataset acquired from nine healthy subjects through 22 electrodes located according to the 10-20 system. The dataset includes two sessions recorded on different days for each subject, with each session containing 288 trials. The data is sampled at 250 Hz and includes a band-pass filter between 0.5 Hz and 100 Hz.
dcterms:title: BCI Competition IV Dataset IIa
